markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Symphony of Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=1347) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor. Once per day, you can cast [_vampiric exsanguination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=353) as a 7th-level divine innate spell.
name: Symphony of Blood
